arm_group.description: The pressure level of the suction unit (DF 601, Hanlien, Taipei, Taiwan) will be set at the maximal (-70 cm Hg).
The pressure level of the suction unit will be set at the half-maximal (-35 cm Hg).

brief_summary.textblock:
This prospective, randomize, controlled trial will compared maximal to half-maximal suction
      pressure applied during water exchange in patients undergoing minimally sedated colonoscopy.
      We test the hypothesis that maximal suction pressure is more efficient and causes shorter
      insertion time.

clinical_study.brief_title: Comparing Maximal and Half-maximal Suction Pressure Applied During Water Exchange in Colonoscopy

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:

          -  Patients undergoing minimally sedated colonoscopy performed by YHH

        Exclusion Criteria:

          -  known history of obstructive lesions of the colon,

          -  allergy to meperidine,

          -  massive ascites,

          -  past history of partial colectomy, or

          -  refusal to provide written informed consent.

intervention.description: the pressure level of the suction unit (DF 601, Hanlien, Taipei, Taiwan) will be set at the half-maximal (-35 cm Hg).
The pressure level of the suction unit (DF 601, Hanlien, Taipei, Taiwan) will be set at the maximal (-70 cm Hg).

facility.name: Buddhist Dalin Tzu Chi General Hospital

clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Controlled Trial Comparing Maximal and Half-maximal Suction Pressure Applied During Water Exchange in Colonoscopy
